metadata.title: USN-2461-3 -- PyYAML vulnerability
metadata.description: Stanis≈Çaw Pitucha and Jonathan Gray discovered that PyYAML did not properly handle wrapped strings. An attacker could create specially crafted YAML data to trigger an assert, causing a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2461-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-yaml - 3.10-4ubuntu0.1 python3-yaml - 3.10-4ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
